basics.summary: I am from India, interested in building systems, microservices for scalability, so that awesome products are always online on the internet.

Part of the team who develops and maintains Ruby on Rails application, used by sellers for inventory and order management.
Handle day-to-day operations related to batch servers and feature deployments.
Practicing agile methodologies among teams, embracing devops.

Developed analytics dashboard using Javascript chart libraries.
Made use of AWS API to automate various infrastructure level tasks.
